title: Antimatter - Cinematic Electronic SciFi Music
description: 10 tracks of cinematic electronic music for SciFi games. Ambient and combat loops.
longDescription:
AUDIO PREVIEW PLAYLIST

Click the link above to listen to the music.


Ten tracks of cutting edge electronic music that are perfect for science fiction games. Deep and powerful synth basses, eerie drones and pads, action-packed arps, and head-banging rhythmic drums.


This album is divided into 5 ambient background tracks for key moments of level exploration, and 5 intense action cues for combat and boss fights. Each track has a seamless loop, a stinger, and a one-shot version with a proper beginning and ending.


Track List:


  1. Airlock - 2:16
  2. Antimatter - 1:46
  3. Catalyst - 1:52
  4. Decay - 1:53
  5. Disintigration - 1:38
  6. Entropy - 2:09
  7. String Theory - 2:16
  8. Terraform - 2:04
  9. Xenology - 2:04
  10. Zenith - 2:04
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 5 hard hitting action tracks.
  • 5 ambient background tracks.
  • Loops, one-shots, and stingers for all tracks.
  • Paired tracks in the same key for smooth transitions.

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 48k

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 21:41

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac

Windows: Yes
